title: >>> MXC
body_text:
LETSCHE vs. WOLF
First Half of the Season 11 "Double Main Event"
The athletically blessed, fearless entity
Ryan Letsche
is in for the fight of his life when he takes on the upstart, the "rookie sensation" if you will,
Justin Wolf
at the 109th dodgeball outing.
It's a story that can be traced way back when to the days of high school. The former track and cross country teammates at one time competed at the highest of scholastic sports and athletic competitions, each earning decisive victories over the other.
"Wolf and I met as track teammates in high school. At first, I was beating Wolf in the 800 meters (half mile) race, while Wolf was beating me in the 400 meters (quarter mile) race. Then Wolf decided to join the Cross Country team during my senior year. Wolf tried his best but he never seemed to beat me. Then when we switched to track, Wolf started to beat me in the 800 meter race. Wolf went on to run 2:05 for the 800 while I was stuck at 2:11."
- RYAN LETSCHE
Years later these two beasts clash on the the very school property they graduated and it seems as if the personal animosity between them has gone unresolved.
"Since high school, I did not see much of Wolf until recently [at dodgeball]. Now I want my pride back by defeating him at the event I have grown as a force to be reckoned with and a veteran of - Dodgeball."
The blocking magician Wolf will have to resort to his quickness and stamina if he intends to come out victorious. Letsche has plenty of big time main event experience and will turn to that knowledge to gain the upper hand.
Whatever the case, the
Letsche vs. Wolf
encounter will be an epic - you can count on it. You do not want to miss the first half off the Season 11
Double Main Event
.
~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~
Love. Hate. And everything in between.
Lady legend
Alison Bertsch
combines forces with the amazing, the one and only
Michael Butler
. Together, they collide with an equally destructive combo when giant killer
Melissa Kerr
partners up with hot hands catching machine
Mike "Sputz" Krott
.
See which of these iconic duos is crowned "King and Queen" in the inaugural
Couples Challenge
.
It all goes down
November 3
with special start time of
6pm
in effect.
body_html:
LETSCHE vs. WOLF
First Half of the Season 11 "Double Main Event"

The athletically blessed, fearless entity Ryan Letsche is in for the fight of his life when he takes on the upstart, the "rookie sensation" if you will, Justin Wolf at the 109th dodgeball outing.

It's a story that can be traced way back when to the days of high school. The former track and cross country teammates at one time competed at the highest of scholastic sports and athletic competitions, each earning decisive victories over the other.

"Wolf and I met as track teammates in high school. At first, I was beating Wolf in the 800 meters (half mile) race, while Wolf was beating me in the 400 meters (quarter mile) race. Then Wolf decided to join the Cross Country team during my senior year. Wolf tried his best but he never seemed to beat me. Then when we switched to track, Wolf started to beat me in the 800 meter race. Wolf went on to run 2:05 for the 800 while I was stuck at 2:11."
- RYAN LETSCHE

Years later these two beasts clash on the the very school property they graduated and it seems as if the personal animosity between them has gone unresolved.

"Since high school, I did not see much of Wolf until recently [at dodgeball]. Now I want my pride back by defeating him at the event I have grown as a force to be reckoned with and a veteran of - Dodgeball."

The blocking magician Wolf will have to resort to his quickness and stamina if he intends to come out victorious. Letsche has plenty of big time main event experience and will turn to that knowledge to gain the upper hand.

Whatever the case, the Letsche vs. Wolf encounter will be an epic - you can count on it. You do not want to miss the first half off the Season 11 Double Main Event.

~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~


Love. Hate. And everything in between.

Lady legend Alison Bertsch combines forces with the amazing, the one and only Michael Butler. Together, they collide with an equally destructive combo when giant killer Melissa Kerr partners up with hot hands catching machine Mike "Sputz" Krott.

See which of these iconic duos is crowned "King and Queen" in the inaugural Couples Challenge.

It all goes down November 3 with special start time of 6pm in effect.
